Comment: On Black's 15th move he creates a strange "force field" around his king which serves as a more powerful protecting wall than any standard castle could provide.  It is almost an invisible electric fence around his exposed, stuck-in-the-center king.  I annotated this game to get some thoughts from other players regarding this bizarre chess phenomenon.

Develops the c8 bishop - Black is down two pawns and needs to get the initiative.  Liquidating queens is conceding defeat.
